thread.title: Comment on Reminder to Watch Tomorrow’s Practice by Rnet
thread.title_full: Comment on Reminder to Watch Tomorrow’s Practice by Rnet

author: Rnet
title: Comment on Reminder to Watch Tomorrow’s Practice by Rnet
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 1 Response Photo by UK Athletics 
Don’t forget to watch tomorrow’s practice on ESPNU from 7-9. Here is what you can expect as stated in Kentucky’s press release. 
“Kentucky fans will have an opportunity to get another early look at this year’s men’s basketball team in action as UK’s practice on Sunday will be televised live on ESPNU from 7-9 p.m. 
The Wildcats will go through various agility and shooting drills in addition to 3-on-3 and 5-on-5 scrimmaging. 
Doris Burke, Jay Williams and Seth Greenberg will be on hand to call the action for ESPNU, along with Andy Katz, who will handle sideline reports. 
It’s the second season in a row UK has had a practice televised live.” 
Tomorrow’s practice will be the first time fans will watch all six new players and the return of Alex Poythress. Article written by Trey Huntsman Keepin' fresh since '96. Covering baseball and football while studying on occasion. Follow me on Twitter @TreyHuntsmanKSR. One response to “Reminder to Watch Tomorrow’s Practice” Rnet October 11, 2015 at 2:20 am | Permalink | Reply 
Just wondering if Skal will be practicing with team ? I pray the answer is yes
